product_entries.full_product_description: 3.2 | Tank Farm Management Servers  - Commodity Grade, working on redundant (Primary and Secondary) hot standby mode with software, including backlit LED Monitor, key board and mouse. Supply , Installation, erection and commissioning of Operator Interface Console Computer (OIC) with 22" colour LED monitor, standard keyboard etc. complete as per specifications at Central Monitoring Hub (CMH).
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: commodity, redundancy: primary and secondary hot standby mode, includes: software, backlit led monitor, keyboard, mouse, supply, installation, erection, commissioning of operator interface console computer(oic), location: central monitoring hub(cmh)

section_context_for_this_product_block: PART A - SUPPLY OF CONTROL  & INSTRUMENTATION (C & I) WORKS  (INSTRUMENTATION, AUTOMATION, CCTV, ILSD, GMS, TFMS, ACS WORKS  ETC)
product_entries.full_product_description: 3.3 | Other items for above - FLP Double compression type SS cable glands - As required , Adaptor Plate for Radar Gauge 4"/6",300# (SS316) for Radar tags - 1 no , Adaptor Plate for Temperature Probes 2",300#  (SS316) - 4 nos , Fabricated Adaptor Chamber for Servo Gauge 2"X 4" X 6"300#  (MOC CS) with pressure gauge, needle valve & pressure relief valve for Servo Tags , Studs as per SA 320 Gr. L7 & Bolts Nuts as per SA 194 Gr. 7 , Gaskets ( 6",4", 2") Spiral wound  Metallic AISI 304, asbestos filled as per API 601 , fabricated cable for CIU & PC - As required ,fabrication of manifold for ionstllation of local indicator (radar /servo)- as required, Cables for communication of Servo , Radar / Servo / field Instruments to CIU (FRLS Cable for data communicatin) - As required , All software and Hardware shall be included as required , Bidder shall consider Process PLC & Tank Gauging system interface on redundant Modbus Communication , Any other item to achieve complete system to successful functioning and integration with other system as required are included.
product_entries.size: adaptor plate for radar gauge: 4"/6", adaptor plate for temperature probes: 2", fabricated adaptor chamber for servo gauge: 2"x 4" x 6"
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: flp(flamproof) double compression type ss(stainless steel) cable glands, adaptor plate for radar gauge: 300# (ss316), adaptor plate for temperature probes: 300# (ss316), fabricated adaptor chamber for servo gauge: 300# (moc cs(carbon steel)), includes: pressure gauge, needle valve, pressure relief valve for servo tags, studs: sa 320 gr. l7, bolts nuts: sa 194 gr. 7, gaskets: spiral wound metallic aisi 304, asbestos filled as per api 601, fabricated cable for ciu(communication interface unit) & pc(personal computer), fabrication of manifold for installation of local indicator (radar or servo), cables for communication of servo, radar or servo or field instruments to ciu (frls(fire retardant low smoke) cable for data communication), all software and hardware included, process plc(programmable logic controller) & tank gauging system interface on redundant modbus communication, any other item for complete system functioning and integration

product_entries.full_product_description: 4.1.1 | Supply of Flameproof cum weather proof  smart type Grounding unit with one green indicating lamp and dual output   for safety earthing of tank trucks, suitable for giving safety interlocking signal to PLC all complete as per specifications
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: protection: flameproof and weather proof, indicator: one green indicating lamp, output: dual, application: safety earthing of tank trucks, feature: suitable for giving safety interlocking signal to plc(programmable logic controller)

section_context_for_this_product_block: PART A - SUPPLY OF CONTROL  & INSTRUMENTATION (C & I) WORKS  (INSTRUMENTATION, AUTOMATION, CCTV, ILSD, GMS, TFMS, ACS WORKS  ETC)
product_entries.full_product_description: 4.2.1 | Supply  of  Dual redundant (Parallel/ Hot Standby) Programmable Logic Controller (Process PLC) along with PLC Panels, Marshalling Panels, Input Output  modules, Power supply units, Relays with base, barriers, TBs, Dual Ethernet ports per processors, Serial Interface Modules, HMI console, wirings, glands, plugs, other modules/ hardwares required for interfacing all the required field and Central Monitoring Hub (CMH) equipments including spare requirements, licenses, tags, GUI, softwares etc complete as per specification and tender document. AI -25 Nos DI -96 Nos DO -80 Nos Serial Interface Ports: 28 Minimum 20% spare IO to be supplied as per tender specification. Count  of PLC panel shall be optimized to accomodate all the signals in one panel only.
product_entries.size: ai(analog input): 25 nos, di(digital input): 96 nos, do(digital output): 80 nos, serial interface ports: 28
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: redundancy: dual redundant (parallel or hot standby), includes: plc panels, marshalling panels, input output modules, power supply units, relays with base, barriers, tbs(terminal blocks), dual ethernet ports per processor, serial interface modules, hmi(human machine interface) console, wirings, glands, plugs, other modules or hardware for interfacing all required field and cmh(central monitoring hub) equipment, spare requirements, licenses, tags, gui(graphical user interface), software, minimum 20% spare io(input/output), panel count optimized for all signals in one panel, as per specification and tender document

original_rows.1: xvi) Communication cable, RTD cable, Power cable for TFMS
xvIi) Audio-Visual Annunciation Panel for annunciation at LPG Pump  House, integrated with all Level Switches of MSVs (Single common Panel for all level switches)

Tank Farm Management Servers  - Commodity Grade, working on redundant (Primary and Secondary) hot standby mode with software, including backlit LED Monitor, key board and mouse. Supply , Installation, erection and commissioning of Operator Interface Console Computer (OIC) with 22" colour LED monitor, standard keyboard etc. complete as per specifications at Central Monitoring Hub (CMH).

Other items for above - FLP Double compression type SS cable glands - As required , Adaptor Plate for Radar Gauge 4"/6",300# (SS316) for Radar tags - 1 no , Adaptor Plate for Temperature Probes 2",300#  (SS316) - 4 nos , Fabricated Adaptor Chamber for Servo Gauge 2"X 4" X 6"300#  (MOC CS) with pressure gauge, needle valve & pressure relief valve for Servo Tags , Studs as per SA 320 Gr. L7 & Bolts Nuts as per SA 194 Gr. 7 , Gaskets ( 6",4", 2") Spiral wound  Metallic AISI 304, asbestos filled as per API 601 , fabricated cable for CIU & PC - As required ,fabrication of manifold for ionstllation of local indicator (radar /servo)- as required, Cables for communication of Servo , Radar / Servo / field Instruments to CIU (FRLS Cable for data communicatin) - As required , All software and Hardware shall be included as required , Bidder shall consider Process PLC & Tank Gauging system interface on redundant Modbus Communication , Any other item to achieve complete system to successful functioning and integration with other system as required are included.

Supply of Flameproof cum weather proof  smart type Grounding unit with one green indicating lamp and dual output   for safety earthing of tank trucks, suitable for giving safety interlocking signal to PLC all complete as per specifications

Supply  of  Dual redundant (Parallel/ Hot Standby) Programmable Logic Controller (Process PLC) along with PLC Panels, Marshalling Panels, Input Output  modules, Power supply units, Relays with base, barriers, TBs, Dual Ethernet ports per processors, Serial Interface Modules, HMI console, wirings, glands, plugs, other modules/ hardwares required for interfacing all the required field and Central Monitoring Hub (CMH) equipments including spare requirements, licenses, tags, GUI, softwares etc complete as per specification and tender document. AI -25 Nos DI -96 Nos DO -80 Nos Serial Interface Ports: 28 Minimum 20% spare IO to be supplied as per tender specification. Count  of PLC panel shall be optimized to accomodate all the signals in one panel only.
